page.title: 15FURNACE FIELDS AND CANALS
page.content: {FURNACE FIELDS }is an area to the east of Bedworth town centre which is now a large housing estate with the exception of {FURNACE ROAD}and { {MARSTON LANE.}The entire estate is named after trees :- Acacia Crescent Beechwood Road,Birch Close,Chestnut road,Conifer Close,Hazel Grove,Lilac Road,Oak Close and Pine tree Road. Marston Lane starts at Nuneaton Road and goes through to Bulkington over the Coventry Canal,past Marston Hall Farm. The main London railway line passes over the lane and on to Bulkington. The Coventry canal is in {FURNACE {FIELDS}area and also the junction with Ashby canal with runs parallel with {MARSTON LANE.}The Coventry canal goes on to Nuneaton.
